entropy.configuration.parser

Class PlainTextConfigurationSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • entropy.configuration.parser.FileConfigurationSerializer
      • entropy.configuration.parser.PlainTextConfigurationSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationSerializer

    public final class PlainTextConfigurationSerializer
extends FileConfigurationSerializer
    Serialize and un-serialize a configuration from/to a plain text format, human readable. Mostly the original format of a configuration.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
